items.message:
Flooding is possible in this area.

Monitor local water levels and weather conditions. Avoid using low lying footpaths or entering areas prone to flooding. Start acting on your flood plan if you have one.

items.description: The north Norfolk coast from Old Hunstanton, to and including Cley

River levels are now steadily falling, but still remain quite high in some locations. The forecast is for no further rainfall for the next few days.
